Package gov.sandia.geotessbuilder

Class GeoTessBuilderMain

java.lang.Object
gov.sandia.geotessbuilder.GeoTessBuilderMain
public class GeoTessBuilderMain extends Object
Class provides a main() method to implement construction of a new GeoTessGrid or resolution refinement of an existing GeoTessModel based on a specified Properties file.
Author:
sballar

    • getGrid

      public static GeoTessGrid getGrid(double triangleEdgeLength) throws Exception
      Convenience method that returns a GeoTessGrid with approximately uniform triangle edge lengths.
      Parameters:
      triangleEdgeLength - in degrees. Should be a power or 2, i.e.: 64, 32, 16, 8, 4, 2, 1, 0.5, 0.25, etc.
      Returns:
      GeoTessGrid
      Throws:
      Exception

    • getTessLevel

      public static int getTessLevel(String edgeLength)
      Convert edgeLength in degrees to tessellation level. Returns round(log_2(64./edgeLength)
      Parameters:

      Returns:
